Text: CNN Interview with Craig Goodman about Ken LayKen I have had a few interviews about Enron and have put as good a spin as possible on it If you want to send press to me I might be able to help given everyone who is piling on Much love to your family Call me if I can do anything to help out Craig Original Message From Craig Goodman mailto Sent Tuesday January PM To craig Goodman Subject CNNcom Transcripts TRANSCRIPTSlthtml
